Icon Files Needed:

Please create the following icon files for the extension:
- icon16.png (16x16 pixels)
- icon48.png (48x48 pixels)
- icon128.png (128x128 pixels)

Design Guidelines:
- Use the PromptForge brand colors (blue #3b82f6 and purple #8b5cf6)
- Include a recognizable symbol (e.g., sparkles âœ¨ or a forge/hammer)
- Ensure icons are clear at small sizes
- Use transparent background
- PNG format with transparency

Temporary Solution:
You can use any placeholder PNG images for testing until proper icons are created.

Tools for creating icons:
- Figma
- Adobe Illustrator
- Canva
- Online favicon generators
